scripts.test: pnpm --filter a11ycap build && pnpm --filter a11ycap-mcp build && playwright test --max-failures=1 && pnpm --filter a11ycap-mcp test
scripts.test:specific: pnpm --filter a11ycap build && pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter a11ycap build && pnpm --filter testpagecra start
scripts.dev:open: pnpm --filter a11ycap build && pnpm --filter testpagecra start:open
